title: Business Analyst
tagsAndSkills: Loans,IT Business Analyst,Front office,Trade finance,Back office,Stored procedures,Risk management,SDLC
jobDescription:
1. Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions.
  2. Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies.
  3. Staying up-to-date on the latest process and IT advancements to automate and modernize systems.
  4. Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings.
  5. Performing requirements analysis.
  6. Documenting and communicating the results of your efforts.
  7. Effectively communicating your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management.
  8. Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports.
  9. Working closely with clients, technicians, and managerial staff.
  10. Providing leadership, training, coaching, and guidance to junior staff.
  11. Allocating resources and maintaining cost efficiency.
  12. Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements.
  13. Performing user acceptance testing.
  14. Managing projects, developing project plans, and monitoring performance.
  15. Updating, implementing, and maintaining procedures.
  16. Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements.
  17. Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users.
  18. Managing competing resources and priorities.
  19. Monitoring deliverables and ensuring timely completion of projects.

jobDescription:

  • Showing sample flat to the clients.
  • Discussing the budget of the clients and explain the client regarding our project

  • Giving best in convincing clients.
  • Handles the payment of the booked client.
  • Lining up the registration process with the help of CRM team.
  • Attaining revisit client and lining up an appointment with Sales Manager for further requirements.
